data.name: ChartAxis
desc: Specifies the axes in a diagram.
Note: The text properties correlate to all axis description elements, not to just a single text element.
**since**

properties.name: ArrangeOrder
desc: The axis description may be arranged in a special order for a better placement.

properties.name: AutoMax
desc: The maximum value of the axis scale is calculated by the chart if this property is TRUE.

properties.name: AutoMin
desc: The minimum value of the axis scale is calculated by the chart if this property is TRUE.

properties.name: AutoOrigin
desc: The origin is calculated by the chart if this property is TRUE.

properties.name: AutoStepHelp
desc: The number of help intervals within a main interval is calculated by the chart if this property is TRUE.

properties.name: AutoStepMain
desc: The distance between the main tick marks is calculated by the chart if this property is TRUE.

properties.name: AxisType
desc: determines which type of axis this is, e.g.
a date-axis or a category-axis
**since**
OOo 3.4

properties.name: CrossoverPosition
desc: Determines where the axis crosses the other axis.

properties.name: CrossoverValue
desc: Determines the scale value on the other axis when CrossoverPosition is set to VALUE.

properties.name: DisplayLabels
desc: Properties for axes labels:
Determines whether to display text at the axis or not.

properties.name: GapWidth
desc: Specifies the width of the gaps between each set of data points in a bar chart.
The value is given in percent of the width of a bar; the valid range is 0 to 600%.

properties.name: HelpMarks
desc: Determines the type of the help marks.

properties.name: LabelPosition
desc: Determines where the axis labels are placed.

properties.name: LinkNumberFormatToSource
desc: determines whether to use the number format given by the container application, e.g.
a spreadsheet document, or from the own property NumberFormat.

properties.name: Logarithmic
desc: Determines if the axis is scaled logarithmically or not (linear).

properties.name: MarkPosition
desc: Determines where the interval marks are placed.

properties.name: Marks
desc: Properties for interval marks:
Determines the type of the marks.

properties.name: Max
desc: Properties for scaling:
Contains the maximum value for the axis scale.

properties.name: Min
desc: Contains the minimum value for the axis scale.

properties.name: NumberFormat
desc: Contains the type id for the number formatter of the axis.

properties.name: Origin
desc: Indicates the reference value where bars or areas have their grounding.
This property has only an effect when the used ODF file format does not allow for further axis positioning or the axis is a secondary y-axis.

properties.name: Overlap
desc: Properties related to bar charts:
Determines the overlap of the bars in a bar-type chart.
The value is given in percent of the width of the bars. The valid range is -100% to +100%. +100% means full overlap, -100% indicates a distance of one bar between 2 neighboring bars.

properties.name: ReverseDirection
desc: Determines if the axis orientation is mathematical or reversed.

properties.name: StepHelpCount
desc: Contains the number of help intervals within a main interval.
E.g. a StepHelpCount of 5 divides the main interval into 5 pieces and thus produces 4 help tick marks.

properties.name: StepMain
desc: Contains the distance between the main tick marks.

properties.name: TextBreak
desc: Determines if long text is broken into multiple lines.

properties.name: TextCanOverlap
desc: Determines if certain labels are hidden, if they would otherwise overlap.
In this case, the value of this property must be set to FALSE.

properties.name: TextRotation
desc: Determines the rotation of the text elements (axis description) in 100th degrees.

properties.name: TimeIncrement
desc: if the current axis is a date-axis the intervals are chosen as given with TimeIncrement
**since**
OOo 3.4
